thread.title: Ground News - IDF shot one Israeli hostage 15 minutes after two others were killed, probe finds
thread.title_full: Ground News - IDF shot one Israeli hostage 15 minutes after two others were killed, probe finds

author: Haaretz
title: Ground News - IDF shot one Israeli hostage 15 minutes after two others were killed, probe finds
text:
Summary by Haaretz According to the Israeli military investigation, soldiers only searched the ground floor of the building where the three hostages were being held. Samer Fuad El-Talalka, Yotam Haim and Alon Shamriz were on the second floor, calling for help. Five days later, they were shot by the IDF Share menu More
